page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = httpd_server_start([L confirm [,L raise_errors [,L use_config_settings [,C server_name ]]]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Server successfully started. .F. = Server not started.

argument.name: confirm
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. (FALSE). If .T. (TRUE) prompts the user to confirm the start.

argument.name: raise_errors
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. (FALSE). If .T. (TRUE) raises error messages in error boxes.

argument.name: use_config_settings
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. (FALSE). If .T. (TRUE) uses user preferences. If .T. (TRUE), the user can choose to suppress the automatic confirmation dialog that appears.

page.discussion: The HTTPD_SERVER_START() function starts the Application Server.
